mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.type, m.path, m.component, m.perms, m.icon, m.sort_value, m.status, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.is_deleted FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.`menu_id` = m.`id` INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` WHERE ur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND rm.is_deleted = 0 AND ur.is_deleted = 0 AND m.is_deleted = 0
